game.title: Dragon Slayer
game.objective: Save the kingdom by slaying the dragon
game.description: You must travel across the mystical lands, overcome numerous challenges to reach the Dragon's lair and slay the dragon to save the kingdom.

task.description: Get information about the dragon's lair from the old sage in the hidden forest.
Trade with the dwarf blacksmith in the mountain for the dragon slayer armour.
Travel to the dragon's lair and defeat the dragon to save the kingdom.
